§ 7239. Enlisted members: officers not to use as servants No officer of the Army may use an enlisted member of the Army as a servant. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 208, § 3639; renumbered § 7239, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(b)(8), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1838.)
